entry.string: Execution halted: the role with uid #(1) has an empty name. This needs to be corrected manually in the database.
entry.translation: Udførelsen stoppede: rollen med uid #(1) har et tomt navn. Dette skal rettes manuelt i databasen.
Der er ikke valgt nogen brugere

entry.string: Execution halted: the role with uid #(1) has an empty name or user name. This needs to be corrected manually in the database.
entry.translation: Udførelsen stoppede: rollen med uid #(1) her et tomt navn eller brugernavn. Dette skal rettes manuelt i databasen.
